summary: Delays the activation of the <doc-ocp-name translate=no>Out</doc-ocp-name> output control port by a given number of milliseconds.

dataPorts.Delay: duration of the loop process (in milliseconds).

controlPorts.In: resets and triggers the block execution.
controlPorts.Loop In: triggers the next step in the process loop.
controlPorts.Out: is activated when the process is completed (the <doc-idp-name translate=no>Delay</doc-idp-name> input data value has been reached).
controlPorts.Loop Out: is activated when the process needs to loop (the <doc-idp-name translate=no>Delay</doc-idp-name> input data value has not been reached yet).
